title: The Evil Queen’s Beautiful Principles - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Magic   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation   Royalty
author: Reia   澪亜
description:
All for revenge-I will be the Queen of Virtue.

The princess, Luxeria, who has memories of her previous life, is imprisoned in the tower because of her too strong magical power.

However, her parents were killed by the betrayal of the Marquis family, and she returned to the front stage as a successor to the throne.

This is the story of the fallen “puppet princess” who can’t do anything until she is called the queen of virtue.>
